name: Space Invaders 3D (ReaganHarper)
description:
Background

You have to defend your home planet from Space Invaders! A new take on an old games, move with arrows or ASWD, shoot with left click, and look around with your mouse.

Game Features

  • 3D Shooter
  • Assets based off of original Space Invaders
  • Aliens navigating by NavMesh

Created for InfoSci 1061: Game Implementation
